channel.title: Client login music?
channel.description: hi, i want to make my client have login screen music, like when you log on runescape, you get the music at the login screen, and it stops when you login, im using pkplanet client, so if you know, pkplanet has a music option, so the first song in the songs folder plays(which is what im doing), but thats not really a login screen music because it keeps playing,and before i release the new updated client, i want to make that new login screen music, it makes it kind of cheap and dumb for the music to play after the login and if they want to play music they can choose from, so if someone could help me make this, i will be very grateful but here are the things i need to do make it so the playlist music plays when the player wants to play music (right now it turns on when the client is turned on) basically, i need to make it so the playlist music plays only when the person wants it to, and somehow make it so a certain music track plays only from when the client is opened, too when they login

item.title: Client login music?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

i guess i can just leave as is

Read full topic

item.title: Client login music?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Don’t make a command if you have Jmenu(Frame) you can just click “Pause/Stop”

Read full topic

item.title: Client login music?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

oh i get it, but not sure how, im pretty sure the command would go something like “if at login screen play” or something, i know thats not how its written, but its just from the top of my head

Read full topic

item.title: Client login music?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Just ask them to Hit the “Pause” button on the file, if you have a Jmenu, otherwise, I’m not sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Client login music?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

thats what ive done, but it plays after login, i want it to stop after login, and they can choose their own music after login

Read full topic

item.title: Client login music?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Add it into the Music file, client sided, into a .mp3 file or whatever, I actually don’t like the idea of music, most people don’t really listen to it anyways, if they want music, they will have there own playing.

Read full topic

item.title: Client login music?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

hi, i want to make my client have login screen music, like when you log on runescape, you get the music at the login screen, and it stops when you login, im using pkplanet client, so if you know, pkplanet has a music option, so the first song in the songs folder plays(which is what im doing), but thats not really a login screen music because it keeps playing,and before i release the new updated client, i want to make that new login screen music, it makes it kind of cheap and dumb for the music to play after the login and if they want to play music they can choose from, so if someone could help me make this, i will be very grateful
but here are the things i need to do
make it so the playlist music plays when the player wants to play music (right now it turns on when the client is turned on)
basically, i need to make it so the playlist music plays only when the person wants it to, and somehow make it so a certain music track plays only from when the client is opened, too when they login

Read full topic
